params.active: Whether the validator should be active
params.inboundAddress: The validator's inbound address `<hostname|ip>:<port>` for incoming connections
params.newValidatorAddress: The address of the new validator
params.outboundAddress: The validator's outbound IP address `<ip>:<port>` for firewall whitelisting (IP only, no hostnames)

changeValidatorStatus(address,bool).details: Deprecated: Use changeValidatorStatusByIndex to prevent front-running attacks

params.active: Whether the validator should be active

changeValidatorStatusByIndex(uint64,bool.details: Added in T1 to prevent front-running attacks where a validator changes its address

params.active: Whether the validator should be active
params.index: The validator index in the validators array

returns._0: The epoch number, or 0 if no fresh DKG is scheduled. The fresh DKG ceremony runs in epoch N, and epoch N+1 uses the new DKG polynomial.

returns.validators: Array of all validators with their information

params.epoch: The epoch in which to run the fresh DKG ceremony. Epoch N runs the ceremony, and epoch N+1 uses the new DKG polynomial.

params.inboundAddress: The validator's inbound address `<hostname|ip>:<port>` for incoming connections
params.newValidatorAddress: The new address for this validator
params.outboundAddress: The validator's outbound IP address `<ip>:<port>` for firewall whitelisting (IP only, no hostnames)
params.publicKey: The validator's new communication public key

changeValidatorStatusByIndex(uint64,bool.notice: Change validator active status by index (owner only) - T1+

getNextFullDkgCeremony().notice: Get the epoch at which a fresh DKG ceremony will be triggered

getValidators().notice: Get the complete set of validators

owner().notice: Get the owner of the precompile

setNextFullDkgCeremony(uint64).notice: Set the epoch at which a fresh DKG ceremony will be triggered (owner only)
